price: ߤߊߡߊ߲ߕߍ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߘߏ߫ ߟߴߏ߬ ߞߊ߲߬ ߌ ߦߋ߫ ߞߎ߬ߙߊ߬ߣߊ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߢߌߡߊ ߞߍ߫ ߥߟߍߟߍ߫
arabic: أَوۡ زِدۡ عَلَيۡهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَرۡتِيلًا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: aw zid ʿalayhi warattili al-qur'āna tartīlan
